name: Harmless Skeleton
description: Harmless Skeleton is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass a variety of levels for an evil skeleton named Skeleton.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
